SYSTEM: Usefulnessofontologiestomodelitlaw.pdf: Página 5
Research questions
• Q1: is IT law modelling suitable to 
teach the domain of IT law to an audience 
of non-legal experts?
• Q2: what is the most suitable design 
formalisms to model the domain of IT law 
for didactic purposes?
31 December 2017
